DJ Comments –

Thank you for sending me the Steve Howell album. I did not know him at all and it was a real pleasure listening to his music. - Jean-Pierre Petit "L'Hôtel Du Blues" CKUT 90.3 FM, Montréal, Canada

Got it and played a couple of tracks already... Nice disc - some very well constructed music! – Sandy W.

90.1 KPFT - Houston

This morning I listened to Steve Howell's CD "Since I Saw You Last." The voice is pleasant and laidback. It's an enjoyable cd to listen to, going from folk, country blues and even a crooner style on "Since I Fell For You." It will have airplay in weeks to come. This is a CD that you like to listen when you want to relax and the opening song "Downtown Blues" puts you in the mood of the CD. A basic mix of songs but catches your emotions as you go along. – Aldo, CKRH fm, Halifax, Nova Scotia.

Thanks for the great Steve Howell's new CD! In my playlist since... today. - L'émission Route66

Many thanks for the copy of Steve Howell's CD "Since I Saw You Last." I am very impressed with material, performance and production and will be airing cuts from it on my show will post playlists when Steve's songs go to air. - Mike Butler, "Blues Cruise" KISS FM 88.1, Tauranga, New Zealand.

THANK YOU SO MUCH for New album guitarist voice Steve Howell , it's very VERY GOOD MUSIC Modern Blues and Country Blues. Wonder album. - Jean Louis POIRIER / Du Blues Sinon Rien sur RADIO BETON , Member du Collectif des Radios Blues

Steve Howell also arrived. He's a very fine musician, thank you very much! – Bremerhaven, Germany

Love this album! It is getting airplay on our Blues shows and "WFWM Sounds Eclectic." Look for it to chart for us in "Living Blues." Chuck Dicken, Station Director, WFWM Public Radio, Frostburg, MD

I have added the Steve Howell's cd in my rotation. I like him. It is nice to see someone keeping the traditional "old school" Blues music going. - Brian "The Blues Dr." Spencer, KUNV 91.5 FM, Las Vegas

love the old time feel to steve's music. – Roger, KUNR, Sparks, NV

Thanks for this wonderful CD ! – Ton Wanten, Triple R Blues Radio, Panningen, The Netherlands

Steve Howell’s music always sets me in the right mood with a clever mix of blues and swaying songs presented in roots music manner. The new CD is no exception, a good one! - Przemek Draheim Radio Sfera, Torun, Poland

A splendid CD! – Blues Show Bob, 107.9 MHz, Pontypridd, South Wales, United Kingdom
